OCD.name: Science Map via 554 Fields (Circle Annotations)
OCD.description: Locate UCSD area tagged records on the UCSD Map of Science

AD.name: Dataset display name
AD.description: Name of the source dataset as it will appear on the visualization.

AD.name: UCSD area
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that gives a UCSD node ID.

AD.name: Label
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that labels the record.

AD.name: Value
AD.description: Choose the column from your table that gives the value associated with a UCSD node.
